properties.name: Bonneville Dam
properties.description: Posted by EgoodmanGet the tour of the Bonneville Dam generator house. Feel that hum? That\'s hydropower, and some damn good white noise.

properties.name: Crema Bakery and Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Johndoe 2728 SE Ankeny St, Portland, OR 97214http://wiki.personaltelco.net/index.cgi/Node602

properties.name: Medium-Loud Roar in a Dark Alleyway
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishingA Scary PlaceAt the end of a park path between hospital buildings I took a right, thinking that it led to a ramp exit for strollers, wheelchairs, and the like. Instead it led to a very narrow dead-end alley, sort of half underground, with a little staircase leading up to a small parking lot. There is a roar here, probably from something to do with the hospital incinerator whose smoke stack rises right above you. The white noise of the who-knows-what bounces off the cement walls around you and you realize that no one across the parking lot on the street would hear your screams if you needed to make them. It\'s the scariest place I\'ve been in a while.

properties.name: Orbit Room Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Offcampustours  1900 Market St, San Francisco

properties.name: PDX airport terminal corridor
properties.description: Posted by EgoodmanOnly a few people use the corridor connecting the two terminals of PDX, even though there\'s an extra-convenient people mover. The white noise here is particularly hushed and meditative, especially with the sunlight outside filtered through clouds.

properties.name: Platial--the room where the servers are kept
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing404 nw 10th portland orI can\'t bear to be in that hum for more than three and a half minutes at a time.

properties.name: Playground on the Parkway
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing   56 waterhouse st, somerville, MAThere is something weird about the way city planners put little kids\' playgrounds right next to highways in cities. I yell at my kid enough under normal circumstances, without having to do it just to be heard over the drone of traffic. This park does have a waterplay toy which sprays water down on you like a shower.

properties.name: Radio Static
properties.description: Posted by MicropopetahThe in-between stationsTo help him get to sleep at night, Micropopetah likes to turn his radio to in-between two stations and listen to the mix of music and static.
